description:
Akimichi Karui is a kunoichi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure] and the mother of http://anidb.net/ch87951 [Akimichi Chouchou]. After the 4th Great Shinobi War, she married http://anidb.net/ch8617 [Akimichi Chouji] and became part of the Akimichi clan. She now resides in http://anidb.net/ch8864 [Konohagakure].
Source: Anime Characters DB, Narutopedia
name: Akimichi Karui
